description.value: IPS body site value set. This value set includes a set of codes from SNOMED CT that may be used to represent body sites (e.g., for laboratory specimen collection).

copyright.value: The HL7 International IPS implementation guides incorporate SNOMED CTÂ®, used by permission of the International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation, trading as SNOMED International. SNOMED CT was originally created by the College of American Pathologists.
